price: Ntiwihutire rero kubasabira ibihano vyo kw’isi, mu vy’ukuri Twebwe Allah, Turabaharurira imyaka bamaze n’ibikorwa bakora, nta na kimwe Twirengagije muri vyo.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
